title: Kevin Dye from Gates
itunes:title: Kevin Dye from Gates
description:
This episode is part of our "you have to hear this band" series (albeit very inconsistent) featuring Kevin Dye from the band Gates. The band is an incredible amalgamation of mid-90's emo with post-rock leanings of a band like Explosions In The Sky. For this very reason, I fell in love with the band early on and had to have Kevin, the lead singer/guitarist on the show. We discuss artistic validation, insecurity and roller coasters. Trust me in telling you that you won't regret checking this interview or his band out. VISIT OUR RAD SPONSOR, SUN TERRACE RECORDS AND THEIR NEW RELEASE FROM RED CURTAIN (FFO: BASEMENT, SUPERHEAVEN ETC...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
